title: Clarkesworld Magazine, Issue 125, February 2017
description: Clarkesworld is a Hugo and World Fantasy Award-winning science fiction and fantasy magazine. Each month we bring you a mix of fiction (new and classic works), articles, interviews and art.Our February 2017 issue (#125) * Original stories by Jack Skillingstead and Burt Courtier ("Assassins"), Nin Harris ("Prosthetic Daughter"), Simone Heller ("How Bees Fly"), and Chi Hui ("Rain Ship").* Reprints by Cecelia Holland ("Dragon''s Deep") and K.J. Parker ("The Dragonslayer of Merebarton").* Non-fiction by Christopher Mahon, an interview with Nnedi Okorafor, an Another Word column by Genevieve Valentine, and an editorial by Neil Clarke.
author: Neil Clarke
